TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_u_tademaw_kya_makadih_tu_nu_hekal, title = u_tademaw_kya_makadih_tu_nu_hekal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_tademaw_kya_makadih_tu_nu_hekal} }

S.FORM: u tademaw namakahekal ku sakatineng tu. tuud amin, hakya walu a bataan a palasubu (80%) wai pabaw henay kunikadihan,tada u mata kusapi aadih kuyadahay, u mata hananay unu likat akuhak, nuhhekal a tineng masasing pataynin i sapiadih nu mata mamin pataynin i punu', sakasaan makadih ku tademaw tu tuud, umata nu tademaw atu punu' kuma tinengay tu wayway kumi laheciay, ukikay atanu demaw asaka tineng nu pyakpunu' atu sapi sasinng ani laaciyan, malamata kusapi sassing,

o tademaw namakahekal ko sakatineng to. tood amin, hakya walo a bataan a palasobo (80%) wai pabaw henay konikadihan,tada o mata kosapi aadih koyadahay, o mata hananay ono likat akohak, nohhekal a tineng masasing pataynin i sapiadih no mata mamin pataynin i pono', sakasaan makadih ko tademaw to tood, omata no tademaw ato pono' koma tinengay to wayway komi laheciay, okikay atano demaw asaka tineng no pyakpono' ato sapi sasinng ani laaciyan, malamata kosapi sassing,
